alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Lafayette; Miller; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 10:27AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Hempstead, Miller, Lafayette and southwestern Nevada Counties, northwestern Caddo and northwestern Bossier Parishes, eastern Marion, southeastern Cass, Harrison, western Panola, central Rusk and southeastern Gregg Counties through 1100 AM CST... At 1026 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Fulton to 7 miles southwest of Henderson. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Henderson, Carthage, Atlanta, Stamps, Lewisville, Vivian, Hallsville, Jefferson, Tatum, Oil City, Fouke, Beckville, Mooringsport, Bradley, Hosston, Rodessa, Garland, Ida and Gilliam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
